content.rendered:
About red rose

The Basmati variety of rice is called the “King of Rice” with undoubted supremacy across the world. Basmati grows only in the foothills of the Himalayas, in the region of Punjab. Red Rose Basmati rice has a unique aroma, extra length, slender grain, high nutritional value, low-fat content, and fluffy texture and lengthens two to three times upon being cooked. Our basmati is aged for six to twelve months, enhancing its famous aroma and taste, minimizing rice stickiness, and is then enjoyed by food connoisseurs around the globe.

About gunjal

Under our brand, Gunjal Basmati Rice, we make sure to provide the finest quality of grains. With Gunjal Basmati, we believe in delivering nutritional values along with a scrumptious taste to our customers. Our rice is naturally aged with each grain carrying a long & slender texture which on cooking gives pleasant & distinguished aroma. Our rice will give you a relishing delight worthy of a royal feast with an incredible taste of Indian Basmati. Your quest for quality ends here.
